concept.title: Creating a Proxy Client-Side Region
concept.shortdesc: This section provides code examples for creating and customizing proxy client-side regions.

note.p: Creating a region through the native client API only creates a proxy client-side region. A corresponding region with the same name and path should also exist on the servers that have been configured for client connections and upon which the client will perform its operations.

conbody.p: To create a region, you create a RegionFactory using the RegionShortcut that most closely fits your region configuration. From that, create your region, customizing the settings as region attributes as needed.
